titleStmt.title: The rogue discovered, or a congratulatory verse upon a book newly publisht (a piece much desired, and long expected) called the English rogue, a witty extravagant. Sold by Francis Kirkman, at the Princes Arms in Chancery Lane.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Head, Richard. English rogue.
Verse - "Friend, had I but seen your book in manu-script,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
